text: Karl Freiherr von Drais (29 April 1785 â€“ 10 December 1851) was a noble German forest official and significant inventor in the Biedermeier period. He was born and died in Karlsruhe. Drais invented the Laufmaschine ("running machine"). Category:1785 births Category:1851 deaths Category:German inventors Category:People from Karlsruhe
title: Karl Drais
